inclusion.criterion: Indication for catheter ablation intervention with planned preoperative cardiac CT scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior myocardial infarction (using the international definition of MI: Q waves or imaging evidence of regional myocardial akinesis/thinning in the absence of a non-ischemic cause with documentation of prior ischemic injury)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: One of the following monomorphic VT events within last 6 months:
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A: ≥3 episodes of symptomatic VT treated with antitachycardia pacing (ATP)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: D: sustained VT below detection rate of the ICD documented by ECG or any cardiac monitor
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: E: Sustained VT recorded on 12 leads ECG in the absence of ICD
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Affiliated or beneficiary of health insurance
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable or unwilling to provide written informed consent.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active ischemia (acute thrombus diagnosed by coronary angiography, or dynamic ST segment changes demonstrated on ECG) or another reversible cause of VT (e.g. drug-induced arrhythmia), had recent acute coronary syndrome within 30 days thought to be due to acute coronary arterial thrombosis, or have CCS functional class IV angina.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Are known to have protruding left ventricular thrombus or mechanical aortic and mitral valves.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have had a prior catheter ablation procedure for VT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presenting arrhythmia: polymorphic VT or ventricular fibrillation (VF).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Are in renal failure (Creatinine clearance <30 mL/min), have NYHA Functional class IV heart failure, or a systemic illness likely to limit survival to <1 year.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, breast feeding women and women who are of childbearing age and not practicing adequate birth control. (French HAS criteria or following methods are considered adequate):
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
